Title: I'm the Talking Ass
Writer: Jenji Kohan (created by), Tami Sagher, Anthony Natoli (story editor), Merritt Tierce (staff writer)
Actors: Taylor Schilling, Natasha Lyonne, Uzo Aduba, Danielle Brooks
Plot: Aleida struggles to find work on the outside. Backed into a corner, Nikki pleads her case to Red. Taystee reaches out to Caputo for help.
